title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Framework-Based Enhancement of Academic Library Information Utilization Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic literature search and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can effectively search for topic-related papers in academic databases and systematically organize results.
Learners can apply criteria for evaluating the reliability and suitability of academic resources and make judgments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can independently operate reference management tools using library digital platforms and mobile apps.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
